about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm not just a developer - I'm a digital architect, a passionate soul obsessed with the magic behind every line of code. My kingdom? The intersection between the relentless logic of algorithms and the boundless creativity of the modern web.I firmly believe that the best applications aren't those that work perfectly, but those that solve real problems with discreet elegance. My approach? Transforming technical complexity into user simplicity.

list.title: EMIT Business Hub
list.description: Complete web application for training and human resources management at EMIT Business Hub. Features an intuitive interface, robust backend, and innovative QR code badge generation for all members, staff, and managers. Simplifies member validation with one-click approval and automatic email notifications.

list.title: CyberCafe OpenService
list.description: Innovative web application for complete cybercafe management with smart timer system, integrated payment and real-time financial analysis. Automatic generation of daily revenue reports and weekly income visualization through interactive charts.

list.title: Management Application
list.description: Collaborative task management tool in real-time

contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me, I will respond as soon as possible.

descriptions.uiux: In simple terms: I create websites so easy to use that even your grandmother could order online without calling for help!
descriptions.academic: Graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Intranet and Internet Application Development (DAII) from EMIT, University of Fianarantsoa in Madagascar. I now specialize in integrating Artificial Intelligence to create digital solutions that anticipate user needs and exceed expectations.My goal: to merge the technical excellence acquired during my academic journey with AI innovation to design applications that don't just function, but understand and adapt to your users.
descriptions.networks:
Networks
Mastery of network fundamentals: Cisco configuration, routing (RIP, EIGRP), NAT and IP address management for infrastructures.
descriptions.ai: Exploration of artificial intelligence technologies and their integration into innovative applications.
